Name: Final Attack VI
Desc:
Direct Attack Skill hits create a chance of an additional attack. Must have a Crossbow equipped.
Also, permanently enhances Snipe VI.
Required Skill: Final Attack: Crossbow Lv. 20 or higher

HFields.h1:
[Final Attack Type Skill] A 60% chance of Final Attack that attacks at 340% Damage.
[Passive Effects: Snipe VI Damage +30%p, Enhance Snipe VI Damage +30%p, Enhance Snipe VI additional attack damage +30%p, Ultimate Snipe VI Damage +30%p, Ultimate Snipe VI additional attack damage +30%p]
